title: C++
description: The grandfather of everything else. But with extra things.

fields.name: What is it?
fields.value: C++ is a general-purpose programming language that is a superset of C. It is well suited for games and desktop applications. It was created in 1985 by Bjarne Stroustrup.

fields.name: Advantages
fields.value:
- Powerful and efficient
- Built-in functions
- Great for system programming
- Building block for many other languages
- Portable
- Middle-level language
- Very fast
- Very extensible
- Memory efficient
- Object oriented programming
